section.name: Introduction
section.p: This artifact provides a TextschluesselVerzeichnis implementation backed by XML files. See the XML schema jdtaus-textschluessel-1.1.xsd for further information regarding these XML documents. XML resources are read using any available TextschluesselProvider implementation. The ClasspathTextschluesselProvider default implementation expects the XML documents to be located in directory META-INF/jdtaus named textschluessel.xml. This location can be changed by updating the configuration file located at META-INF/jdtaus/module.xml.

section.name: Upgrading from 1.0
section.p: All released 1.0 artifacts come with a default textschluessel.xml document located at META-INF/jdtaus/textschluessel.xml holding Textschlüssel instances as specified by ZKA. Starting with version 1.1 this default XML document is no longer part of the artifact's jar file. When upgrading your application to 1.1 you need to provide the Textschlüssel configuration yourself by either placing at least one XML document in the application's classpath for use by class ClasspathTextschluesselProvider or by supplying a custom TextschluesselProvider implementation providing the Textschlüssel resources. The former default document is available for download as a starting point from here.

Starting with version 1.1 the name attribute of the <transactionType> XML element has been removed from the XML schema. It is recommended to update any XML documents by removing that attribute and specifically to also update any XML document's schemaLocation attribute to point to the new 1.1 schema document located at http://sites.jdtaus.org/jdtaus-banking/1.0.x/jdtaus-banking-ri-textschluesselverzeichnis/jdtaus-textschluessel-1.1.xsd.
